job.title: Senior Platform Engineer (Java)
job.description:
The Senior Software Engineer will work with the architects, leads, and fellow engineers to design, develop, implement, and deploy software architectural components and solutions for system-to-system integrations, cloud infrastructure provisioning automation, data integration pipelines, data modeling with high security, performance, and low total cost of ownership.
What You Will Be Doing
Design, develop, and implement API based system-to-system integrations
Design, development and implement big data integration pipelines
Source data ranging from traditional data warehouses, curated data sets in Data Lakes, and real-time streaming
Implement cloud infrastructure lifecycle management automation leveraging Infrastructure as Code principles and framework on Azure
QA test automation for functional and regression testing key product features and capabilities
Partner with architects and tech leads to troubleshoot and resolve critical customer escalations on technical, stability, and performance issues
What You Need for this Position
Bachelors Degree or above in computer science or related field
5 years of enterprise SaaS/IaaS/PaaS full stack software development experience with focus on big data platform and analytics
3 years of Webservices/Microservices API development using Java plus Spring Boot, Python and Scala
2 years of Azure or AWS or GCP cloud services platforms
2 years of database development experience with any one of SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, RedShift, or MongoDB
Security-- In-depth understanding of user authentication and authorization with SSO, SAML, and OAuth; knowledge of data encryption
DevOps -- hands-on experience with/modern CICD/automation/eco-systems such asAzure DevOps and/pipelines, Terraform, Azure Resource Manager, AWS Cloud Formation, Kubernetes, GitHub, and configuration management tools such as Puppet, Chef, or Ansible
So, if you are a Senior Platform Engineer (Java) with experience, please apply today!
